content: the perfect mix of style and sun protection this crochet bucket hat features bold stripes that instantly elevate your look stitched in red heart super saver it s worked from the top down in a simple half_double_crochet stripe pattern the crown takes shape with easy increases followed by even rounds for the sides and a brim created with additional increases whether you re hitting the beach or adding a playful touch to your outfit this hat is a must-have to stay effortless cool materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a turqua 0512 1 ball or 89 yds/82 m contrast b blue 0886 1 ball or 89 yds/82 m size one size to fit adult approx 20 - 22 51-56 cm head circumference
